name: .OPBACC
summary: Learn about .OPBACC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an OPBACC file with OpenBacc (Web). To do so:
Navigate to and open your OPBACC file.
If you want to extract the assets or .JSON file an OPBACC file contains:
Open it as you would any .ZIP file.
You can use OpenBacc to export the video an OPBACC file describes as a .WEBM file. To do so:
Open your OPBACC file with OpenBacc.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .opbacc file in OpenBacc
images.caption: OPBACC file open in OpenBacc
